FunctionalRequirements.Name: Privacy Setting Customization
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall allow users to customize their privacy settings, enabling them to control what personal information and health data is shared with caregivers and how it is utilized.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Compliance Review Interface
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall provide an interface that allows compliance officers to review and approve privacy settings and system architecture changes to ensure adherence to legal standards.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Audit Log Management
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall maintain comprehensive audit logs documenting all user and system interactions, ensuring that logs are immutable and can be reviewed for compliance purposes.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Transparency in Data Practices
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall provide clear and accessible information regarding data practices, including how user data is collected, stored, and shared, to promote transparency and build user trust.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Override Compliance Settings
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall implement a mechanism that allows compliance settings to override user or developer preferences where necessary to ensure regulatory compliance.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: User Interface Accessibility
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall provide an accessible user interface that accommodates older adults with varying technical abilities, ensuring that all privacy settings can be easily navigated and understood.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Performance Under Load
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall maintain optimal performance and responsiveness during peak usage times to ensure that users can effectively manage their privacy settings without delays.
